formalpara.title: Review the evolving Software Requirements work product
formalpara.para: Conduct frequent specification team reviews of the evolving Software Requirements for clarity, consistency, feasibility, and testability. Make simplification of requirements an explicit objective.

formalpara.title: Validate the Software Requirements work product with the customer and peer organizations
formalpara.para: Review the Software Requirements with the customer and affected peer organizations for agreement on the basis for software specification.
